title: Eliminating Emotional Baggage
body:
Getting rid of your emotional baggage could be key to creating better relationships for yourself, better health for yourself, and more abundance for yourself. Bradley Nelson demonstrates a simple form of muscle testing, the elbow test, that can guide you to locate the source of your emotional baggage. 


The Emotion Code chart can be found at: https://www.gaia.com/wp-content/uploads/Emotion-Code-Chart.pdf
teaser: Getting rid of your emotional baggage is the key to creating better relationships for yourself, better health for yourself, and more abundance for yourself.

title: Accessing the Subconscious Mind
body:
The subconscious computer within you is by far the most powerful part of who you are. It creates new cells, digests your food, and keeps your heart beating.. We believe the body remembers everything that has ever happened to you, and that it knows why your life may not be working as well as it should. Bradley Nelson demonstrates another simple form of testing, the sway test, that can serve as a means to allow you to communicate with your subconscious mind in determining the source of your difficulties.

The Emotion Code chart can be found at: https://www.gaia.com/wp-content/uploads/Emotion-Code-Chart.pdf
teaser: Bradley Nelson demonstrates another simple form of testing, the sway test, that can serve as a means to allow you to communicate with your subconscious mind in determining the source of your difficulties.

title: Releasing the Heart Wall
body:
Scientists now believe that the heart is a second brain. It is the part of you that holds your creativity and your best ideas. It’s the source of love and romance, and really the core of your being. This is what the ancient people believed about the heart, and for the first time, with the tools we have today, we’re finding out the ancient people were right. The heart is the key to love and happiness.
Dr. Bradley Nelson guides viewers on how to cope with all the negative energy and emotional trauma of a broken heart. When you experience what we call heartbreak several times, your subconscious mind may put up a wall around your heart — a wall made up of layers of your emotional baggage and feelings of isolation. Find out if you have a Heart Wall, and how to release those trapped emotions that make up the energy that creates a Heart Wall around you. When you let go of the negative emotions and your own Heart Wall is taken down, your ability to find love and to receive love can be vastly improved.
The Emotion Code chart can be found at: https://www.gaia.com/wp-content/uploads/Emotion-Code-Chart.pdf
When you experience what we call heartbreak several times, your subconscious mind may  put up a wall around your heart — a wall made up of layers of your emotional baggage. Find out if you have a Heart Wall, and how to release those emotions that make up the energy that creates a Heart Wall around you. When the Heart Wall is taken down, your ability to love and to receive love can be vastly improved.


The Emotion Code chart can be found at: https://www.gaia.com/wp-content/uploads/Emotion-Code-Chart.pdf
teaser: Scientists now believe that the heart is a second brain. It is the part of you that holds your creativity, your best creative ideas. The heart is a key to health; a heart wall interferes with the heart’s communication.
